name: Symbol Pop
description:
Symbol Pop is a classic popstar game with beautiful Symbol theme!
Symbol Pop can make many surprise prizes for you;
The more coins you get in games, the more reward you could have. It's THAT SIMPLE and THAT AWESOME!
Symbol Pop is a game where you must select a color group of tokens on a grid and click to destroy them.
Tap on two or more adjacent stars to destroy them out.
The more tokens you destroy with a single click, the higher your score will be.
Symbol Pop involves more deep thinking and strategy instead of fast paced action.
Symbol Pop features:
- Auto Save game level
- involves more deep thinking and strategy instead of fast paced action.
- There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage
- Try to clear all blocks, you will get a lot of bonus!
- it's a good choice to kill time and training brain.
- You can get bonus when you reach the new level.
- Try your best luck to play Lucky Spin every day, collect free coins and prizes.
